item.magenta.mountainsunder.desc.3: Ten breaths it sings, a whirlwind of the hand,
item.magenta.mountainsunder.desc.4: One strike, a mountain falls, then turns to sand.
item.magenta.dragon.desc.1: Dragon's grace bestowed, a demon-slaying edge.
item.magenta.dragon.desc.2: Seven stars in iron bound, a cosmic woven pledge.
item.magenta.dragon.desc.3: From sacred springs it rises, to banish ghostly ledge.
item.magenta.dragon.desc.s3: and release a halo, inflict damage to nearby undead enemies.
item.magenta.pure.desc.1: Celestial grace bestowed, a flawless, gleaming sight,
item.magenta.pure.desc.2: Purity, the heaven's forge, where darkness yields to light,
item.magenta.pure.desc.3: With righteous winds it soars, and evil's flames take flight.
item.magenta.pure.desc.s3: Increase Morality when execute the "Kind" behavior of killing monsters.
item.magenta.pure.desc.s4: Reduce Morality when execute the "Evil" behavior of attacking non-undead mobs.
item.magenta.pure.desc.s5: Effects and appearance of the sword changes according to the value of Morality.
item.magenta.pure.desc.s7.1: Morality < -40: 3 ATK, -2 Durability/attack, may inflict 5 damage.
item.magenta.pure.desc.s7.4: 20 < Morality ≤ 40: 7 ATK, +1 Durability and release halo when attack.
item.magenta.pure.desc.s7.5: Morality > 40: 9 ATK, +10%% speed, +2 Durability and release regeneration halo when attack.
item.magenta.muticharge_crossbow.desc.1: Unique design makes it shoot 3 arrows simultaneously.
item.magenta.muticharge_crossbow.desc.2: It's powerful but have to manually insert arrow 3 times.
item.magenta.resrune.desc.1: Text engraved in this stele grants it power...
item.magenta.dmgrune.desc.1: Text engraved in this stele grants it power...
item.magenta.spdrune.desc.1: Text engraved in this stele grants it power...
item.magenta.disc_typhoon.desc.1: By the creator of this area, try it out!
item.magenta.cores.desc.1: Core dropped from colossus, probably useful in somewhere...?
death.attack.magenta.bystone.player: %1$s smashed by the rock while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.magenta.bystone.item: %1$s was buried as a grave by %2$s with %3$s
death.attack.magenta.wave.player: %1$s killed by the wave while fighting %2$s
death.attack.magenta.soul.player: %1$s 's soul was engulfed while trying to escape %2$s
